name: Draw with PowerTools FX
description:
Your own workshop of realistic Power Tools!

Draw with PowerTools FX is a fun new kind of drawing app, which gives you a collection of authentic power tools to put to work on your iPhone, iPad or iPod touch, with none of the hassle, mess and danger.

Choose from a selection of tools (including the CHAINSAW, POWER DRILL and JIGSAW) and use them to cut and manipulate different materials and surfaces. You can even import photos from your device’s camera, and share your creations easily via email, Facebook and Twitter.

Each tool is authentically simulated, with all the noise, vibration and sparks of the real thing, as well as the satisfaction of mastering DIY skills.


Choose from the following tools:

▶ Chainsaw
▶ Angle-Grinder
▶ Circular Saw
▶ Drill
▶ Mini-Cutter
▶ Sander


Features:

▶ Ten different surfaces and materials to cut and drill.
▶ Import your own photos.
▶ Share your finished creations via email, Facebook or Twitter.
▶ Precision cutting controls using tilt and multitouch.
